overview: Morning Musume.'22 DVD Magazine Vol.141 features new member Sakurai Rio for the first time! ! In order to deepen friendship with the members, she will hold a fun game tournament with everyone! ! Compete in 4 games: "Send Hula Hoop", "Flying Disc 4!", "Catch Parachute", and "My daughter fell down". And Morning Musume. Regular BBQ! Does the content of the meal you can eat change with the points you earn in the game??? Can you really get delicious meat!?? There is also a talk corner between the leader Fukumura Mizuki and the new member Sakurai Rio!
title: Morning Musume.'22 DVD Magazine Vol.141
